mision.texto: To contribute to the integral development of communities surrounding the Pico de Orizaba National Park by strengthening their social, economic, and environmental resilience.

vision.descripcion: We aspire to be a benchmark of inclusive and sustainable community transformation.
lista: Preserve and restore the environment of the Pico de Orizaba National Park.
Ensure basic services and reduce marginalization and social lag.
Improve the quality of education and health.
Promote local and solidarity-based economic development that generates decent jobs.
Channel the strength and leadership of youth as a driver of transformation.
Exercise good governance and financial transparency, inspiring trust among donors and allies.

equipo.descripcion: Our team is made up of people committed to community well-being, social justice, and environmental protection.

lista.descripcion: Responsible for the legal representation and strategic leadership of the organization.
In charge of documentation, records, and institutional communications.
Coordinates project execution and fieldwork teams.
Manages institutional identity, social media, and media relations.
Designs financial sustainability strategies and budget control.

quienesSomos.descripcion: At CIMA, we blend creativity and commitment to build sustainable solutions for society's most urgent challenges.

aliados.descripcion: We collaborate with leading organizations to maximize our impact

cPreguntas.descripcion: Find quick answers to the most common questions about our work

faqsLeft.pregunta: What types of projects does CIMA A.C. develop?
faqsLeft.respuesta: We develop projects focused on environmental conservation, education, health, local economic development, and community strengthening.

faqsLeft.pregunta: Who is part of the CIMA A.C. team?
faqsLeft.respuesta: Our team is made up of multidisciplinary professionals committed to social development.

faqsRight.pregunta: How can I participate as a volunteer?
faqsRight.respuesta: You can contact us through our volunteer form or attend our recruitment events.
Yes, we accept donations both in-kind and monetary to support our projects.
